faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions from our Polish patients
faq.q1: How much can I save on dental treatment in Turkey?
faq.a1: On average, patients from Poland save 50-70% compared to local prices.
faq.q2: Is dental treatment in Turkey safe?
faq.a2: Absolutely. Our clinic uses EU-certified materials, state-of-the-art equipment, and our dentists are internationally trained. Turkey is one of the world's top destinations for dental tourism.
faq.q3: How long do I need to stay in Fethiye?
faq.a3: Depending on your treatment, typically 5-10 days. Simple procedures like veneers take 5-7 days, while implant treatments may require two visits of 3-5 days each.
faq.q4: Is the airport transfer really free?
faq.a4: Yes! We provide completely free VIP transfer from Dalaman Airport to your apartment in Fethiye and back. We also provide free daily transfers between your apartment and our clinic.
faq.a5: We offer free luxury apartment accommodation throughout your treatment. The apartments are fully furnished with Wi-Fi, kitchen, and laundry facilities in central Fethiye.
faq.q6: Do you speak Polish or English?
faq.a6: Yes, we have Polish and English speaking patient coordinators who will assist you throughout your entire journey — from initial consultation to aftercare.
faq.q7: What if I need follow-up treatment after returning to Poland?
faq.a7: We provide detailed aftercare instructions and remain available via WhatsApp and email. If follow-up treatment is needed in Turkey, we cover your accommodation again.
faq.a8: Simply send us your dental X-ray or photos via WhatsApp or our contact form. We'll provide a free consultation and detailed treatment plan within 24 hours.
